com.orbitz.monitoring.lib
Class BaseMonitoringEngineManager

java.lang.Object
  com.orbitz.monitoring.lib.BaseMonitoringEngineManager

@ManagedResource(description="Management interface for ERMA MonitoringEngine")
public class BaseMonitoringEngineManager
extends java.lang.Object

A class that allows the MonitoringEngine to be manageable.

setMonitoringEnabled

public void setMonitoringEnabled(boolean monitoringEnabled)
Enable/disable all functions of the MonitoringEngine. When disabled the MonitoringEngine will ignore all Monitor events.

Parameters:
monitoringEnabled - set to false to disable all Monitor events.

getMonitoringEnabled

public boolean getMonitoringEnabled()
Get current enabled state of the MonitoringEngine.

Returns:
enabled state of MonitoringEngine

updateLevelForMonitor

@ManagedOperation(description="Sets the monitoring level for the monitor(s)")
@ManagedOperationParameters(value={,})
public void updateLevelForMonitor(java.lang.String nameStartsWith,
                                                                              java.lang.String levelStr)
Update MonitoringLevels for a set of monitors

Parameters:
nameStartsWith - either the full name of the monitor or a partial string that will be used to match on the beginning of the monitor name
levelStr - string representation of the monitoring level to set

addLevelForProcessor

@ManagedOperation(description="Sets a monitoring level on a MonitorProcessor")
@ManagedOperationParameters(value={,})
public void addLevelForProcessor(java.lang.String name,
                                                                             java.lang.String levelStr)
Assign a MonitoringLevel to a MonitorProcessor. MonitorProcessor levels override ProcessGroup levels for every group that contains the processor instance.

Parameters:
name - MonitorProcessor name
levelStr - monitoring level

getOverrideProcessorLevelsListing

@ManagedAttribute(description="Gets a view into processor level overrides")
public java.lang.String getOverrideProcessorLevelsListing()
Get listing of MonitorProcessor override levels map.

Returns:
description of override processor levels map
